rules.natural: Either a person has funding from an organization or an organization develops a technology.
If an organization hires a developer who is a person, then whenever that person has technical skills in a technology, the organization completes a project for that technology.
Provided that a person finds an investor for an organization, the organization hires a developer who is that person.
Either a person finds an investor for an organization or the organization secures a grant for a technology.
Under the condition that an organization secures a grant for a technology, the organization hires a developer who is a person.
If an organization faces technical challenges with a technology, then that organization develops that technology.
Whenever an organization experiences delays with a technology, it develops that technology.
Either an organization restructures its team involving a person, or it faces technical challenges with a technology, or it experiences delays with that technology.
Provided that an organization pivots its strategy for a technology, it achieves a breakthrough with that technology.
Either an organization pivots its strategy for a technology or it does not restructure its team involving a person.
Either an organization acquires another organization or it develops a technology.
Provided that an organization innovates a product for a technology, it does not acquire another organization.
If an organization conducts research on a technology, then it innovates a product for that technology.
Whenever an organization tests prototypes for a technology, it innovates a product for that technology.
Either an organization scales operations for a technology, or it conducts research on that technology, or it tests prototypes for that technology.
Either an organization submits documentation for a technology or it responds to office actions for that technology.

If an organization responds to office actions for a technology, then whenever it files an application for that technology and secures a patent for that technology, it establishes intellectual property for that technology.

rules.prover9_expression: (receives_approval(Organization, Technology) -> (submits_documentation(Organization, Technology) -> (files_application(Organization, Technology) -> (secures_patent(Organization, Technology) -> establishes_ip(Organization, Technology)))))
rules.natural: Provided that an organization receives approval for a technology, then under the condition that it submits documentation for that technology, and if it files an application for that technology, and in case it secures a patent for that technology, it establishes intellectual property for that technology.
If a person receives training in a technology, then whenever that person lacks expertise in that technology, it is not the case that the person has funding from an organization.
Whenever an organization analyzes problems for a technology, it implements solutions for that technology.
Either an organization analyzes problems for a technology or it develops workarounds for that technology.
Provided that an organization develops workarounds for a technology, it optimizes processes for that technology.
Under the condition that an organization optimizes processes for a technology, it improves efficiency for that technology.

rules.prover9_expression: (improves_efficiency(Organization, Technology) -> (-(faces_technical_challenges(Organization, Technology) | experiences_delays(Organization, Technology)) -> meets_deadlines(Organization, Technology)))
rules.natural: Provided that an organization improves efficiency for a technology, then in case it does not face technical challenges or experience delays with that technology, it meets deadlines for that technology.

Under the condition that an organization finalizes a deal with another organization, then if it negotiates terms with that organization, and provided that it acquires that organization, it gains market share for a technology.
Either an organization performs due diligence on another organization or it reviews assets of that organization.
If an organization reviews assets of another organization, then it finalizes a deal with that organization.
Either a person joins a team at an organization or the person receives training in a technology.
Under the condition that an organization resolves disputes over a technology, it does not face legal issues with that technology.
Provided that an organization consults lawyers regarding a technology, it settles claims about that technology.
If an organization settles claims about a technology, then it resolves disputes over that technology.
Under the condition that an organization encounters regulatory hurdles for a technology, it does not delay the launch of that technology.
Either an organization encounters regulatory hurdles for a technology or it fails compliance for that technology.

If it is not the case that performing due diligence by an organization on another organization leads to finalizing a deal with that organization, then the organization faces legal issues with a technology.

Provided that it does not hold that performing due diligence by an organization on another organization implies finalizing a deal with that organization, the organization consults lawyers regarding a technology.
Provided that it is not true that failing compliance by an organization for a technology results in not delaying the launch of that technology, a person has technical skills in that technology.
If an organization does not develop a technology, then it secures a patent for that technology.
Under the condition that an organization does not develop a technology, it delays the launch of that technology.
